Literature.Title: Short Simple Linear Peptides Mimic Antimicrobial Complex Cyclodecapeptides Based on the Putative Pharmacophore
Literature.Author: Jiang Z, Chen H, Xiao S, Pan L, Guo C

Sequence Information.Target Organism: Candida albicans ATCC 10231(MIC=>250µg/ml),Staphylococcus aureus ATCC 6538(MIC=31.2µg/ml),Staphylococcus epidermidis ATCC 8799(MIC=31.2µg/ml),Staphylococcus aureus ATCC 43300(MIC=>250µg/ml),Escherichia coli ATCC 8099(MIC=31.2µg/ml),Klebsiella pneumoniae ATCC 13883(MIC=>250µg/ml),Pseudomonas aeruginosa ATCC 9027(MIC=31.2µg/ml)
